price: 167. Kuwa gaalooba oo ka hor istaaga (dadka) Jidka Alle, waxay habaabeen habow aad u fog.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ قَدۡ ضَلُّواْ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi qad ḍallū ḍalālan baʿīdan
